item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“Nets8, post:4, topic:245449”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=321888.msg2545046#msg2545046 date=1227227585]

You’re not providing the sufficient information for me or anyone else to help you. Please include your “::mute” command aswell.

To mute you do the report abuse then mod option then report them.
[/quote]

Do you use a BufferedReader to scan a list?[/quote]

Porobably not because I don’t know what that it o.O[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 20, 2008, 08:51:10 pm[/size][hr]Could someone help me…?

item.title: I failed at making an ::unmute command lol..help please
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

I tried this:

if (command.startsWith("unmute") && playerRights >= 1) { String victim = command.substring(7); mutedate = 0; sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully unmuted.");

I knew it would be wrong I just thought that was the idea or something. Can someone please help me. I know what I need to have done. I need to make it so the character-mutedate = 0 in the characters file in the moreinfo folder. I don’t know how to do that though. I think all I have to change is the “mutedate = 0;” in the code to something. What do I change it to?

Read full topic
item.source: I failed at making an ::unmute command lol..help please
